description.value: You stop holding your power back, unleashing it all in a catastrophic blast. All creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] take @Damage[(@actor.level)d6[bludgeoning]|traits:area-damage]{1d6 bludgeoning damage per level} with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.spellDC.value)|basic:true]. Your psyche subsides as your power is expended.
